product_name: REI Kimtah Rain Pants - Men's 30" Inseam
long_description: Thanks to eVent(R) fabric technology, men's REI Kimtah Pants with 30 in. inseam help backpackers stay dry and comfortable when they get caught out in a spring or summer rain squall. Waterproof/breathable eVent(R) fabric's unique membrane allows sweat vapor to easily pass through; so you can go all out, yet stay dry and enjoy chill-free rest stops. Fabric is also windproof to 60+ mph. Lightweight nylon fabric makes these pants easy to pack and well suited to spring and summer temperatures. Elastic at back waist enhances comfort and fit; adjustment tabs on the sides fine-tune the fit. Tricot lining helps the pants slip easily over other layers; soft brushed tricot lines the waist for added comfort and moisture wicking. Lower leg zippers allow easy on/off; cuff drawcords and snap tabs secure cuffs to boot tops; gaiter grommets allow you to add your own instep cords. REI Kimtah Pants with 30 in. inseam have 2 zip hand pockets and 1 back zip pocket.
short_description: Thanks to eVent(R) fabric technology, men's REI Kimtah Pants with 30 in. inseam help backpackers stay dry and comfortable when they get caught out in a spring or summer rain squall.
